title: Brant
description: Former Marine, Brant Henderson despises weakness in any form, yet that is exactly the position he finds himself him in. He's injured, bleeding out, and on the verge of certain death. Until the blood of a beautiful, forbidden Bracadyte enters his veins. Her life force holds the power to heal his body, even when he's in danger of losing his heart...Syrina awakens after a devastating plane crash only to find herself in the clutches of the Cuban government. Worse still, Brant is injured and on the verge of death. Her Bracadyte blood is his only chance for survival, even though it means bonding with him for life.
author: Ditter Kellen
